name: RandoMonsters
description:
My submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Controls

  1. A , D , Space to Move around
  2. Mouse and left click to aim and shoot your Gun

How to Play?

  1. Shoot Monsters to gain points, but there is a twist.
  2. For every Blue monster you shoot, your mouse angle gets randomized
  3. For every Green monster you shoot, their approach speed gets randomized
  4. For every Red monster you shoot, you get a random amount of health
  5. For every Purple monster you shoot, all monsters get randomized

Good luck! You'll need it ;)
